summary: An email chain from April 22, 2022, in which Mark Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, inquires with the FBI about who the lead FBI agent is in charge of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email is forwarded within the FBI's Violent Crimes units.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: He sends an email to the FBI asking to identify the lead FBI agent investigating his brother Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as Mark Epstein's brother; his death is the subject of the FBI investigation being inquired about.

connections.description: Mark Epstein identifies Jeffrey Epstein as his brother in his inquiry to the FBI.

events.title: Inquiry into Jeffrey Epstein Death Investigation
events.description: Mark Epstein sends an email to the FBI asking for the name of the lead FBI agent in charge of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

keyFacts: Mark Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, contacted the FBI in April 2022 regarding the death investigation.
The inquiry was directed to the FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force and Violent Crime Unit.
The document shows an ongoing FBI investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death as of April 2022.
The email is marked as external and is forwarded internally within the FBI.
